law.catch_line: Site characterization report -- Corrective action plan.

text.section: Upon execution of an agreed order, the applicant shall submit to the cabinet within the agreed timeframe a site characterization report and a corrective action plan.

The corrective action plan for properties involving hazardous substances over which the Department for Public Health has regulatory authority shall, at the time of submittal to the cabinet, also be submitted to the commissioner of the Department for Public Health.

law.history: Created 2001 Ky. Acts ch. 128, sec. 6, effective June 21, 2001.
